booking.emailConfirmation: We'll email your confirmation email to this address
booking.phoneHelper: In case campsite needs to call you
booking.addPasswordButton: + Add a password to create an account
booking.createAccountDescription: Create an account so you can manage your bookings and return more easily.
booking.passwordRequirement: Must be at least 8 characters with uppercase and lowercase
booking.vehicleRegHelper: Write each line (e.g. on a week) or line down (name)
booking.partyNames: Names of people in your party
booking.partyNamesHelper: Campsite requires each name so they can register your party
booking.specialRequestsPlaceholder: Tell us about any special requirements, accessibility needs, dietary restrictions, or any other information that will help us make your stay more comfortable...
booking.specialRequestsHelper: We will send this message from you to the site and they will do their best to meet your requests. Some requests may incur additional costs.
booking.dateOfBirthHelper: Please fill in your date of birth to receive special offers on your birthday with the Camp in the future!
booking.socialMediaUrlHelper: The Camp will send confirmation notifications to guests via social media before check-in
booking.photoConsent: Store memories with the Camp (random photos)
booking.photoConsentHelper: The Camp will take commemorative photos for you during your stay, images will be shared on the fanpage, you can choose to agree/disagree.
booking.referralSource: How did you hear about the Camp?
booking.depositDueText: Payment due {amount} now deposit due. This is a {percent}% non-refundable deposit.
booking.balanceDueText: Campsite will debit your card automatically on {date}

cancellationPolicyText.refund: We normally refund 14 weeks or annual stay.
cancellationPolicyText.noRefund: No refund/cancellation for amendments is ever available as early departures.
cancellationPolicyText.notLiable: The site is not liable for any lost or ruined items in the event of severe rains.
cancellationPolicyText.cancelReschedule: If you need to cancel or reschedule your booking, we will endeavour to do this at no additional cost to you provided that a replacement can be found (as possible) via that transaction can be within specified times and for an available facility matches and/or the form provided within terms of your.
cancellationPolicyText.nonRefundable: Please note that our deposits / said to be non-refundable.
cancellationPolicyText.fullPolicyText: For complete terms and conditions, please visit our website or contact us directly.

rules.under18: Under 18s must be accompanied by their parents or legal guardians.
rules.observed: Your site must be observed or which bookings.
rules.noGroups: No groups of 3 or more people aged 16-25 can book unless led by and Pitchup.com (including under 16-year) child who is also supported by the disabled child/rent facilities.
rules.disability: People with a disability of 3 or more members must get their carers and immediate family members allowed to get members.
rules.children: Please be mindful of slots with children are not admitted to the swimming pool area.
rules.extraCharges: Families/groups including young children, aged 0-16, are subject to extra charges.
rules.noEvents: No evening events permitted on Pitchup.com.
rules.pool: This site, concerning pool is open between 10/04 and 06/09 (subject for weather conditions.)
rules.restaurant: The restaurant is open between 01/04 and 31/10.
rules.noCommercial: Commercial vehicles (including vans for work, without seating) are not accepted.
rules.accommodation: Your bookable size/type or class, accommodation units must apply from extra tent online or electric awnings or may be changed.
rules.linen: All bed linen and towels (including any motorhome/static) are not only supplied in all visitors must be returned.
rules.deposit: A £10 cash refundable deposit is required for 1 key to the disabled toilet/shower facilities.

booking.agreeTermsText: By making this booking I agree to

booking.termsAgree: I agree to the booking terms

validation.termsRequired: You must agree to the booking terms

locationPicker.mapHelper: Enter latitude/longitude above to display marker on map
locationPicker.guideTitle: 📍 How to get coordinates from Google Maps:
locationPicker.guideStep2: Search for your campsite address on the map
locationPicker.guideStep3: RIGHT-CLICK on the red pin (location) or exact position on the map
locationPicker.guideStep4: In the menu that appears, click on the coordinates in the first line (e.g., 12.2745538, 109.2165281)
locationPicker.guideStep5: Paste into Latitude and Longitude fields above
locationPicker.guideStep6: Marker will automatically move to that location on the map
locationPicker.guideNote: ⚠️ DO NOT take coordinates from the URL (e.g., @12.27...,109.20...) - those are viewport center coordinates, not the location!

form.name: Item Name

form.isActiveDescription: Inactive items are hidden from public search and bookings
form.displayOrderDescription: Lower numbers appear first in the list
form.editParameterDescription: Update Min/Max settings for this parameter
form.noParametersAvailable: No parameters available. Create one first.
form.parametersNote: Items need at least one parameter that Controls Inventory.

form.imageUploadHint: Max 10 photos (PNG, JPG, GIF). Images will be automatically compressed to around 400-500KB for optimal loading speed. First photo becomes main thumbnail.
form.youtubeHint: Add a YouTube video by pasting the full URL or Video ID.
form.youtubeStartTimeHint: Number of seconds into the clip to start at.
form.parameterAttachmentNote: Parameter attachment will be fully implemented in next iteration
form.clickToAttachItem: Click "Attach an Item" to add items to this package
form.clickToAttachMenuItem: Click the button below to attach food/beverages

calendarStatus.title: Default Calendar Status
calendarStatus.availableDesc: Item will be bookable, except when closed by Closure Item Events
calendarStatus.unavailableDesc: Use if usually unavailable; Item Events will make your item bookable
calendarStatus.disabledDesc: Never bookable; used to Archive unused items for later use

itemEvents.noEvents: No events attached. Save item first to attach events.

itemEvents.attachExistingDescription: Select events to attach to this item

types.specialPricingDesc: Apply special pricing for specific dates
types.closureDatesDesc: Block dates when item is unavailable

taxes.title: Taxes & Deposit
taxes.depositHint: Deposit required at time of booking
taxes.attachExistingTaxDescription: Select taxes to attach to this item
taxes.taxNameHint: This will be displayed on invoices and receipts.
taxes.accountNumberHint: Tax account number to display on invoices.
taxes.compoundDesc: Apply on top of earlier taxes that have a lower Display Order.
taxes.inclusiveDesc: This tax is already included in the item's asking price.
taxes.inclusiveHiddenDesc: If this tax is inclusive this will cause it not to be displayed to the end customer.
taxes.applyByDefaultDesc: This tax will be enabled for all items which do not disable it.

packages.title: Item Add-Ons
packages.overridePriceHint: Override the calculated package price with a custom starting price
packages.dialogDesc: Select items to include as add-ons for this package
packages.editDialogDesc: Configure settings for this package item
packages.pricePercentageDesc: Percentage of the item's base price to charge (0-100)
packages.optInDesc: Whether this item is required or optional for the package
packages.datesSettingDesc: How booking dates are determined for this add-on

menuProducts.title: Menu Products
menuProducts.dialogDesc: Select food/beverages to include in this item

createCategoryDialog.title: Create New Category
createCategoryDialog.description: Add a new category to organize your glamping items
createCategoryDialog.weightHint: Categories with higher weight appear first in lists

createTagDialog.title: Create New Tag
createTagDialog.description: Add a new tag to filter and organize your glamping items
createTagDialog.weightHint: Tags with higher weight appear first in lists

sidebar.categoryDesc: Categories help you organize your inventory into basic groups, making it easy for customers to find what they want.
sidebar.categoryExamples: Examples: One-Bedroom Cabins, Accessories, Day Tours, Night Tours
sidebar.tagsDesc: Tags allow for further filtering of items in reports and during booking. Tags may describe various attributes such as Location, Duration, Size, or Theme.
sidebar.itemNameDesc: Your item name should be clear and concise, describing exactly what you offer.
sidebar.itemNameExamples: Examples: High-Flying Zipline Tour, Sunfire Cabin, 1-Seat Kayak
sidebar.summaryDesc: Give your item a short description. This will be displayed to the customer when they view your items.
sidebar.summaryExamples: Examples: "Get a true taste of Chicago and eat where the locals do with this delicious two-hour walking tour. Enjoy freshly made pizza, discover our burgeoning microbrew culture, and much more."
sidebar.inventoryDesc: Set the default quantity of your available supply.
sidebar.inventoryExamples: Examples: 20 bus seats for a tour, 1 cabin, 55 Segways, 50 rooms.
sidebar.parametersDesc: Parameters give you the ability to set price points and/or to control your inventory. Your item can have multiple parameters to accommodate different configurations.
sidebar.parametersExamples:
- Charter Tour: Qty (Hide, Inventory), Adult (Price), Child (Price)
- Rooms: Qty (Hide, Inventory), Adult (Price), Child (Price), Additional Parking (Price)
sidebar.mediaDesc: Up to 5 photos can be added to each item. Photos should be high quality and showcase your item effectively.
sidebar.mediaPoints:
First photo becomes the main thumbnail
Accepted formats: PNG, JPG, GIF
Maximum file size: 10MB per image
Recommended size: 800x600px or larger
sidebar.mediaCaptionHint: This is where your photo caption will be shown
sidebar.youtubeDesc: Add a YouTube video to give customers a better view of your item.
sidebar.youtubeHint: Paste the full URL or just the video ID from YouTube.
sidebar.groupPricingDesc: You can adjust pricing based on the size of the booking group (group size = sum of all parameters).
sidebar.seasonalDesc: Used to set the pricing and/or availability of an item
sidebar.seasonalExamples: Examples: Summer, Winter, Low Season Rates, and/or days of the week: Mon, Tues, Weds
sidebar.specialPricingDesc: Typically used to override seasonal pricing
sidebar.closureDatesDesc: Close the availability of an item over a specific date span
sidebar.addOnsDesc: Add-ons allow you to bundle related items together, giving customers optional or required additions to their booking.
sidebar.addOnsExamples:
Examples:
- Optionally attach a life jacket to a kayak rental
- A souvenir T-shirt to a zipline adventure
- Breakfast service to a cabin booking
sidebar.pricePercentageDesc: Set what percentage of the add-on's regular price should be charged when included in this package.
sidebar.pricePercentageExamples:
- 100% = Full price
- 50% = Half price
- 0% = Free add-on
sidebar.packageStartingPriceDesc: Override the calculated total with a custom package price. Useful for promotional bundles or special offers.
sidebar.packageStartingPriceExample: Example: Instead of showing individual prices, display "Starting from 2,500,000 VNĐ"
sidebar.menuProductsDesc: Attach food and beverage items from your menu to this glamping item. Customers can add these products when booking.

rules.title: Rules
rules.subtitle: Manage booking rules and restrictions
rules.noRuleSets: No rule sets found for this zone
rules.selectRuleSetPrompt: Select a rule set to view and edit rules
rules.newRuleSetDescription: Create a new rule set to apply to events or discounts
rules.deleteRuleSetConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this rule set? This action cannot be undone.
rules.infoActivate: To activate a rule: Enter a value and click Save
rules.infoDisable: To disable a rule: Clear the value and click Save
rules.infoDefaultOverride: Default rules override custom rules. Turn off matching rules in Default when using custom rule sets.
rules.defaultOnlyWarning: This rule only works in Default rule set

cutoff.name: Cutoff
cutoff.description: Prevents bookings X days/hours before the start date. Set to at least 1 to disallow same-day bookings.

forward_booking_window.name: Forward booking window
forward_booking_window.description: Number of DAYS in the future to accept bookings.

past_booking_window.name: Past booking window
past_booking_window.description: Number of DAYS in the past to accept bookings. When not set, it assumes 0.

max_booking_quantity.name: Maximum booking quantity
max_booking_quantity.description: Limit the number of items to be booked in a single order. Defaults to your item QTY.

max_duration_per_item.name: Maximum duration per item
max_duration_per_item.description: Set the maximum allowable duration (nights). Uses per-item unit settings.

max_items_per_booking.name: Maximum items per booking
max_items_per_booking.description: Limit the number of items in a single booking.

max_subtotal_value.name: Maximum subtotal value
max_subtotal_value.description: Limit the maximum subtotal of an item (VND). Only works in Default rule set.

min_booking_quantity.name: Minimum booking quantity
min_booking_quantity.description: Limit the minimum number of items to be booked in a single order.

min_duration_per_item.name: Minimum duration per item

footer.tagline: Discover the best camping and glamping sites across Vietnam.
footer.newsletterDesc: Get the latest camping tips and offers.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.companyInfo: CampingHub Vietnam is a trading name of CampingHub Limited Company, registered in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.
introduction.agentRole: CampingHub acts as an agent only, facilitating bookings between customers and campsite owners. We do not own or operate the campsites listed on our platform.
introduction.agreement: By using our website and making a booking, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
introduction.modifications: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Please review them regularly. Your continued use of the website after changes constitutes acceptance of the new terms.
introduction.warranty: We make every effort to ensure the accuracy of information on our website, but we cannot guarantee its completeness or reliability.

importantInfo.title: Important Information
importantInfo.agentOnly: CampingHub acts as an agent ONLY. We do not provide the accommodation or camping facilities ourselves. The campsite owner is responsible for all aspects of your stay.
importantInfo.noPackage: We do not sell package holidays. Each booking is for accommodation only, unless specifically stated otherwise.
importantInfo.breach: Any breach of campsite rules may result in your immediate removal from the site without refund.
importantInfo.noQualityCheck: While we endeavor to work with quality sites, we do not inspect every facility. Any concerns should be raised immediately with the site owner and subsequently with us.
importantInfo.campingInfo: Information about campsites, including facilities and availability, is provided by the site owners. While we make reasonable efforts to ensure accuracy, we cannot be held responsible for any errors or omissions.
importantInfo.liability: CampingHub's liability is limited to the amount you paid for your booking. We are not liable for any indirect losses.
importantInfo.forceMajeure: Neither party shall be liable for failure to perform obligations due to circumstances beyond reasonable control, including natural disasters, wars, or government actions.

useOfWebsite.title: Use of Website
useOfWebsite.suspension: We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your access to the website at any time without notice.
useOfWebsite.personalUse: The website is for your personal, non-commercial use only.
useOfWebsite.legitimateBookings: You must only make legitimate bookings. We reserve the right to cancel any booking we believe to be fraudulent.

prohibitedList.republish: Republish material from this website without prior written consent
prohibitedList.sell: Sell, rent, or sub-license material from the website
prohibitedList.publicDisplay: Publicly display any material from the website
prohibitedList.commercial: Use this website for any commercial purposes without our express written consent
prohibitedList.ipRights: Use this website in any way that infringes intellectual property rights
prohibitedList.modify: Modify or copy the materials on this website
prohibitedList.fraudulent: Use this website for any fraudulent or unlawful purposes
prohibitedList.interfere: Attempt to interfere with the proper working of the website
prohibitedList.unreasonableLoad: Place an unreasonable load on our infrastructure

booking.title: Booking Process
booking.procedure: When you make a booking, you are making an offer to purchase accommodation services. Your booking is confirmed only when we send you a booking confirmation email.
booking.personalInfo: You must ensure that all personal information provided is accurate and complete. You are responsible for all bookings made using your account.
booking.confirmation: Upon confirmation, a contract is formed between you and the campsite owner, with CampingHub acting as agent.
booking.payment: Payment must be made in full or as a deposit (as specified) at the time of booking. The balance (if applicable) will be charged according to the campsite's payment schedule.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Amendments
cancellation.modify: If you need to cancel or modify your booking, please contact us as soon as possible. Cancellation and amendment terms vary by campsite.
cancellation.charges: Cancellation charges will apply as specified in the campsite's cancellation policy shown during the booking process.
cancellation.noShow: If you fail to arrive on the date of your booking without prior cancellation, you will be charged the full amount and no refund will be given.

responsibility.title: Your Responsibilities
responsibility.legalCapacity: You confirm that you are at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into a binding contract.
responsibility.password: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password.
responsibility.accuracy: You are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of all information you provide.
responsibility.personalInfo: You must ensure that your personal data is kept up to date.

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.immediate: If you have a complaint during your stay, you must bring it to the attention of the campsite owner immediately so they have the opportunity to resolve it.
complaints.contact: If you are unable to resolve the matter with the campsite, please contact us within 28 days of your return. We will investigate and respond within a reasonable timeframe.

insurance.title: Travel Insurance
insurance.recommendation: We strongly recommend that you take out comprehensive travel insurance covering cancellation, medical expenses, personal belongings, and public liability.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law and Jurisdiction
governingLaw.enforceability: If any provision of these terms is found to be unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force.
governingLaw.jurisdiction: These terms are governed by Vietnamese law, and any disputes shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Vietnamese courts.

introduction.intro: This privacy policy sets out how we will process and use any Personal Information that you provide to us, or that we may collect as a result of visiting CampingHub.com. Please read the following information to understand our practices with regards to your personal data and how we will treat it.
introduction.dataController: For the purposes of the Data Protection Act 2018, the identity of our data controller shall be available upon enquiry by email to privacy@glampinghub.vn.
introduction.changes: Any changes to the CampingHub.com privacy policy will be made to this page. Your continued use of the Website will constitute your agreement to the changed Terms.

informationCollected.title: Information we may collect from you
informationCollected.intro: We may collect and process the following data ("Personal Information") about you:

list.forms: Any information that you provide by filling in forms on our site, including name and contact details, card details and special requirements. This includes information provided at the time of booking, registering to use our site, applying for a job, posting material, requesting further services or subscribing to any service offered by us on the site. We may also request further information should you report a problem with our site
list.correspondence: We may keep a record of any correspondence should you contact us
list.visits: Details of the resources you access and of your visits to our site
list.transactions: Details of transactions you may carry out through our site and of the completion of your orders

ipAndCookies.title: IP addresses and cookies
ipAndCookies.computerInfo: We may collect information about your computer; this is statistical data concerning your browsing actions enabling us to tailor the site to match your interests and preferences, and does not identify you individually. This information includes your IP address where available, operating system and browser type, for system administration and to report collective information to our advertisers.
ipAndCookies.cookiesInfo: We may also collect information about your general internet usage using cookies stored on the hard drive of all computers. The cookies contain valuable information that is transferred to your computer's hard drive. In collecting this information we are able to improve our site and deliver a better and more personalised service.
ipAndCookies.refuseCookies: You can refuse to accept cookies but note that in doing this you may be unable to access certain parts of our site. You can do this by activating the setting on your browser which allows you to refuse the setting.
ipAndCookies.advertiserCookies: Our advertisers may also use cookies but please note that we have no control over this.

googleAnalytics.title: Google Analytics
googleAnalytics.usage: In addition to this we use Google Analytics, a web analytics service provided by Google, Inc. ("Google"), including its remarketing functions. Third-party vendors, including Google, show our ads across the internet.
googleAnalytics.thirdParty: We and third-party vendors, including Google, use first-party cookies (such as the Google Analytics cookie) and third-party cookies (such as the DoubleClick cookie) together to inform, optimize, and serve ads based on someone's past visits to your website.
googleAnalytics.dataTransfer: The information generated by the cookie about the use of our website (including your IP address) will be transmitted to and stored by Google on servers in the United States. Google will use this information for the purpose of evaluating your use of our website, compiling reports on website activity for CampingHub.com and providing other services relating to website activity and Internet usage.
googleAnalytics.consent: By using this website, you consent to the processing of data about you by Google in the manner and for the purposes set out above.
googleAnalytics.optOut: You can limit data used for interest-based advertising by visiting Google Ads Settings or aboutads.info website.

dataStorage.title: Where we store your personal data
dataStorage.location: Any data that we collect from you may be stored at, and transferred to, a destination outside the European Economic Area (EEA). This data may also be processed by staff who operate outside the EEA working for us or one of our suppliers. In submitting your personal data, you agree to such a transfer and the storing and processing of this data.
dataStorage.security: We will do our best to protect your personal data, unfortunately, the transmission of information over the internet is not entirely secure and we cannot guarantee the security of data transmitted to our sites.
dataStorage.transmission: Any transmission of data is at your own risk.
dataStorage.businessTransfer: CampingHub.com regards the databases of site visitors' information (which may include your Personal Information) as a valuable asset. Should CampingHub.com sell or transfer any of CampingHub.com's business assets this may include the sale or transfer of such databases of information to third parties.

legalBasis.title: Legal basis for processing personal data

consent.title: Consent
consent.description: Consent forms will store the user's agreement to processing their personal data

contract.title: Contract
contract.description: To fulfil our agreements, including but not limited to making holiday bookings, with customers, partners and suppliers, we need to disclose personal data

legitimateInterest.title: Legitimate interest
legitimateInterest.description: Subject to overriding privacy interests of the subject, if there is a shared interest between the subject and CampingHub.com we may use personal data in our sales and marketing

retention.title: Retention
retention.description: We may retain your personal data for a reasonable period of time after your last contact with us. This is to enable us for us to provide our booking service, to resolve problems that may arise in connection with our services, including disputes and litigation, to answer your questions. Data is securely deleted when no longer needed.

howWeUse.title: How we use information about you
howWeUse.intro: We may use the information held about you in the following ways:

list.notifications: To notify you of any changes to our service
list.management: For incorporation in files of existing personal data of CampingHub.com and to the treatment of such for the purpose of management, administrations, mediation and contracting of the services offered by CampingHub.com
list.marketing: For the management of bookings, incidences, statistics, commercial publicity and other promotions by means of electronic mail, SMS, MMS or any other similar means, and the subscription to news bulletins
list.content: To ensure that the content of our site is presented in the most effective manner for you and your computer
list.interactive: To allow you to participate in interactive features of our service, should you choose to do so
list.obligations: In allowing ourselves to carry out any obligations concerning any contracts entered into between you and us
list.fraudPrevention: To assist us with crime and fraud prevention such as identity checking
list.communications: Where you have consented to be contacted, to provide you with the information, products and services requested from us or in the event that we feel will be of interest to you. We may also also permit selected third parties to provide information on goods and services that may be of interest to you

disclosure.title: Disclosure of your information
disclosure.intro: We may disclose your personal information to third parties:

list.suppliers: To relevant suppliers of your travel arrangements that are campsite providers or affiliates
list.contractors: To organisations contracted by CampingHub.com to manage aspects of the Website
list.security: To security, credit checking or fraud prevention agencies
list.authorities: To any relevant public authorities or law enforcement agencies
list.jobChecks: To agencies to check candidates for jobs
list.businessSale: To the prospective buyer or seller of any business or assets in the event that we sell or buy
list.legal: If we are under a duty to comply with any legal obligation to disclose or share your personal data, to protect the rights, property and safety of our customers or others, or to enforce our terms of use for the site

thirdParty.title: Third-party websites
thirdParty.description: From time to time our site may contain links to and from the websites of our partner networks, advertisers and affiliates. If you visit any of these sites please note that they have their own privacy policies and you should check these before submitting any personal data. We cannot accept any responsibility or liability for these policies.

changes.title: Changes to our privacy policy
changes.description: Please check this page regularly for changes made to our privacy policy.

yourRights.title: Access to data and right to erasure
yourRights.intro: Under data protection legislation, you have the right to request access to information about you that we hold. You can also ask us to erase your data.
yourRights.contact: To make a request for your personal information or deletion of your data, contact tech@glampinghub.vn.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion Requests
dataDeletion.description: If you would like to delete your CampingHub account or remove any personal data we store, please send an email to tech@glampinghub.vn with the subject 'Data Deletion Request'. We will verify your identity and confirm the removal within 7 business days.

yourRights.rightsInclude: You also have the right to:

list.object: Object to processing of personal data that is likely to cause, or is causing, damage or distress
list.marketing: Prevent processing for the purpose of direct marketing
list.automated: Object to decisions being taken by automated means
list.rectify: In certain circumstances, have inaccurate personal data rectified, blocked, erased or destroyed; and
list.redress: A right to seek redress, either through the ICO, or through the courts

yourRights.complaint: If you have a concern or complaint about the way we are collecting or using your personal data, you should raise your concern with us in the first instance or directly to the Information Commissioner's Office.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.subtitle: Manage your account information

help.title: About Payouts
help.line1: Payouts are generated monthly by the admin team
help.line2: Each payout represents earnings from all bookings in that month for a specific campsite
help.line3: Pending payouts will be processed and paid according to the payment schedule
help.line4: Once paid, you'll see the payment method and reference details
help.line5: If you have questions about a payout, please contact the admin team

campsiteSelector.noResultsInProvince: No campsites found in selected province

new.tipContent: You can quickly close off a date or adjust inventory in your inventory calendar
new.title: Add Event
new.introText: Item Events are used to modify the price or availability of your inventory items based on dates.
new.introSubText: Without events, your inventory items are simple bookable items available 365 days a year at a fixed (base) price.
new.availableDescription: Items will be available for booking
new.unavailableDescription: Items will be blocked from booking
new.inventoryStatusHint: Set the inventory status for this Item Event. This will override the default item status.
new.recurrenceHint: Set this as a reoccurring or one time event.
new.name: Name
new.nameHint: This may be displayed on customer invoices
new.dynamicHint: Dynamic adjustment of base price, eg: +25%, -10% or -5 đ
new.forceItemLength: Force item length to the above start and end dates
new.viewRules: View Rules to apply to this Item Event
new.errorLoadData: Failed to load categories and items
new.errorRequiredFields: Please fill in required fields (Name and Type)

wishlist.emptyDescription: Save items you love to find them easily later
wishlist.loginRequired: Please log in to save items

glampingConfirmation.title: Booking and Menu Details
glampingConfirmation.canEditMenuAlert: You can edit menu items for each tent. Click the "Edit" button next to each tent to make changes.
glampingConfirmation.payDepositToEditAlert: Please pay the deposit to edit menu items.
glampingConfirmation.cannotEditMenuDeadline: Cannot edit menu items. Menu can only be edited at least 24 hours before check-in.
